description: This file defines API endpoints for user authentication, health checks, and interaction with a weather-based question-answering system. It handles user registration, login, logout, submitting questions, and retrieving conversations and messages, mainly serving as the views layer in a Django REST Framework application.

methods.name: health(request)
methods.description: Provides a health check endpoint indicating the server status.

methods.name: register(request)
methods.description: Handles user registration, creates a new user account if validation passes.

methods.name: login(request)
methods.description: Handles user login, authenticates credentials, and initiates a session.

methods.name: logout(request)
methods.description: Logs out the current authenticated user, ending their session.

methods.name: ask(request)
methods.description: Receives a question, optionally continues an existing conversation, stores messages, and retrieves an answer from the weather QnA engine.

methods.name: conversations(request)
methods.description: Lists all conversations of the authenticated user, including recent messages.

methods.name: conversation_detail(request, conversation_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information and message history of a specific conversation.

ctags.name: django_login
ctags.pattern: /^from django.contrib.auth import login as django_login, logout as django_logout, authenticate$/
